mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_inquiry (in_title, in_content, in_status, in_type, in_create_dt, pm_no, se_no, co_no) VALUES (#{inTitle}, #{inContent}, #{inStatus}, #{inType}, now(), #{pmNo}, #{seNo}, #{coNo})
mapper.select: SELECT in_no, in_title, in_type, in_status FROM tbl_inquiry WHERE co_no = #{coNo} and in_status != 'DELETE' and in_create_dt BETWEEN #{inquiryPageSearchRequestDTO.startDt} AND DATE_ADD(#{inquiryPageSearchRequestDTO.endDt}, INTERVAL 1 DAY) and in_title like CONCAT('%', #{inquiryPageSearchRequestDTO.keyword} ,'%') ORDER BY in_no DESC LIMIT 0, #{inquiryPageSearchRequestDTO.skip}

SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_inquiry WHERE co_no = #{coNo} and in_status != 'DELETE' and in_create_dt BETWEEN #{inquiryPageSearchRequestDTO.startDt} AND DATE_ADD(#{inquiryPageSearchRequestDTO.endDt}, INTERVAL 1 DAY) and in_title like CONCAT('%', #{inquiryPageSearchRequestDTO.keyword} ,'%')

SELECT tin.in_title, tin.in_type, tin.in_status, tin.in_content, IF(tin.in_type = 'PRODUCT', tse.se_name, tro.ro_name) AS name FROM tbl_inquiry tin LEFT JOIN tbl_seller tse on tin.se_no = tse.se_no LEFT JOIN tbl_place_member tpm on tin.pm_no = tpm.pm_no LEFT JOIN tbl_room tro on tpm.ro_no = tro.ro_no WHERE tin.in_no = #{inNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_inquiry SET in_title = #{inTitle}, in_content = #{inContent}, in_modify_dt = now() WHERE in_no = #{inNo}
UPDATE tbl_inquiry SET in_status = 'DELETE' WHERE in_no = #{inNo}
